definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: The electrostatic field distribution is obtained by means of a particular helix coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 用特殊的螺旋座标求出了该系统的静电场分布。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we define a coordinate system for the Drosophila brain.
sentences.chinese: 在这篇论文里，我们为果蝇脑定义一个座标系统。

sentences.english: The experimental curve runs nearly parallel to the abscissa.
sentences.chinese: 实验曲线几乎与模座标平行。

sentences.english: The values of warping coordinates is still expressed in the calculating formulas.
sentences.chinese: 翘曲座标值，仍以计算公式表示之。

sentences.english: The height of the control, in container coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 控制项的高度，使用容器的座标。

sentences.english: The experimental curve runs nearly parallel to the abscissa .
sentences.chinese: 实验曲线几乎与横座标平行。

sentences.english: In this paper the curved coordinate system has been applied for the seismic response analysis of curved girder bridges.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用曲线座标系来计算曲梁桥的地震反应。

sentences.english: The upper left of the control, in container coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 控制项的左上角，使用容器座标。

sentences.english: It is conventional for most cartesian coordinate systems to be right-handed.
sentences.chinese: 习惯上最常使用的笛卡儿座标系统是右手。

sentences.english: Since there are four reflections, the exiting image will be right-handed.
sentences.chinese: 因为共有四次反射，出射的像将是右手座标系。

sentences.english: The instrument which is employed to directly measure the tri-stimulus coordinates of a color is known as a colorimeter.
sentences.chinese: 用来直接测定颜色三刺激值座标的仪器叫做色度计。

definition: starting point or ending point (in stories etc)/end point (math)
lines of latitude and longitude/warp and woof
